thread.title: Airwheel S series 2 wheel self balancing scooter
thread.title_full: Airwheel S series 2 wheel self balancing scooter

title: Airwheel S series 2 wheel self balancing scooter
text: Airwheel S series 2 wheel self balancing scooter , 29 September 2015 -- Airwheel S series two-wheeled electric scooters provide unique way of standing-posture riding with large two-wheeled structure.Unlike Airwheel X series single-wheeled self-balancing scooter that makes riding exciting and somewhat thrilling, riding Airwheel S series two-wheeled electric scooter is a type a mild riding with more relaxation and comforts. In fact, Airwheel riders totally enjoy the dreamlike riding experience with Airwheel S series two-wheeled electric scooter. The large two wheels of S series electric scooter contribute to riding stability, and Airwheel riders do not need to keep balance. Riders can easily control the directions of the two-wheeled electric scooter by the handle and control the scooter by physical movements like back and forth leaning. In fact, the entire riding experience with Airwheel two-wheeled electric scooter is unique and wonderful, enabling riders to have a very healthy way of scooter riding. After all, many people are likely to stay in house all day working or playing with smart phones; therefore, Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter provides riders with a healthy and pleasurable way of riding. Another biggest specialty of Airwheel S series two-wheeled electric self-balancing scooter is the LED display screen that presents real-time stats from the running electric scooter. It is truly a very convenient way of informing Airwheel riders of the running state of the scooter. Riders can better prepare for any situations by learning about the temperature, speed as well as the power consumption. Currently, there are three types of Airwheel S series electric scooters: S3T electric scooter in orange, S3 electric scooter with classic blue color and the robust SUV style of S5 electric scooter. Actually, the three types of Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter provide much differentiated riding experiences. Airwheel S3T electric self-balancing scooter is a music version scooter due to its built-in loudspeaker for music playing; Airwheel S3 electric self-balancing scooter is featured by optimized design style for maximized riding comforts; Airwheel S5 electric self-balancing scooter is considered as the SUV style scooter due to its tremendous performance and premium scooter quality. Truthfully, all the three types of Airwheel S series electric scooters are able to provide dreamlike riding experience for riders. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world.
